mapper.select: select companyCode, siteCode, siteName from site

select equipments.id, company.companyCode, site.siteName, uppergroup.groupName, equipments.eqCode, eqcatalog.eqDetail, subgroup.subgroupName, location.location, func.funcLoc, proc.ProcessName, equipments.energyCode1, equipments.energyCode2, equipments.energyCode3 from equipments join company on company.companyCode = equipments.companyCode join eqcatalog on equipments.eqCode = eqcatalog.eqCode join site on equipments.siteCode = site.siteCode join uppergroup on equipments.groupCode = uppergroup.groupCode join subgroup on equipments.subGroupCode = subgroup.subGroupCode join location on equipments.upperLocationCode = location.locationCode join func on equipments.upperFunctionCode = func.functionCode join proc on equipments.upperProcessCode = proc.processCode where equipments.siteCode = #{siteCode}
mapper.update: update site set siteName = #{siteName} where siteCode = #{siteCode}
